Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Siemens Healthcare Diagnostics Inc. ADVIA 2120 hematology analyzer
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for nRBC-Chex for ADVIA hematology control material for nucleated red blood cell measurement on Siemens ADVIA analyzers
Indications for Use Summary: Assayed whole blood control designed to evaluate accuracy and precision of Siemens Healthcare Diagnostics hematology analyzers in measurement of nucleated red blood cell parameter
